Package com.irurueta.units

Class SpeedConverter

java.lang.Object
com.irurueta.units.SpeedConverter
public class SpeedConverter extends Object
Does speed conversions to different units. To prevent loss of accuracy, conversion should only be done as a final step before displaying speed measurements.

      output - output speed where result will be stored containing output unit.
